Content: Panagoda Army Cantonment-based Overall Operations Command (OOC) headed by Major General Sathyapriya Liyanage was shifted to a new place in Colombo 3. Accordingly, the new OOC Headquarters is established at No: 146, Colombo 3 for overall security operations conducted by tri-services and the Police. OOC coordinate security in Colombo district and Puttlam district. A brief religious ceremony invoked blessings for inauguration of the new office.
